00007 std::string modules::options::GetOption(const std::string& key)const{
00008     OptionsList_t::const_iterator it = fOptions.find(key);
00009     std::string value= it!=fOptions.end()? it->second : "";
00010     return value;
00011 }
00012 template <typename T>
00013 T modules::options::GetOption(const std::string& key,const T& defVal)const{
00014     std::stringstream ss(GetOption(key));
00015     T val=defVal;
00016     ss>>val;
00017     return val;
00018 }

00036 int modules::options::GetVectorStringsByWhiteSpace(const std::string& name, std::vector<std::string>& vect)const{
00037     std::stringstream ss(GetOption(name));
00038     std::string val;
00039     while(ss>>val) vect.push_back(val);
00040     return vect.size();
00041 }
00042 
00043 int modules::options::GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(const std::string& name, std::vector<std::string>& vect, const char* delim)const{
00044     char line[2048];
00045     strcpy(line,GetOption(name).c_str());
00046     char* word = strtok(line,delim);
00047     while(word != NULL){ 
00048             //std::cout<<"ModulesOptions:GetVectorStringsByDelimiter() "<<word<<std::endl;
00049         vect.push_back(word);
00050         word = strtok(NULL,delim);
00051     }
00052     return vect.size();
00053 }

00055 void modules::options::DumpOptions(const std::string& prefix)const{
00056     //std::cout<<"key  "<<" = "<<" value "<<std::endl;
00057     OptionsOrder_t::const_iterator it;
00058     for(it=fOrder.begin();it!=fOrder.end();it++){
00059         std::cout<<prefix<<(*it)->first;
00060         if((*it)->second!=""){
00061            std::cout<<" = "<<(*it)->second;
00062         }
00063         std::cout<<std::endl;
00064     }
00065 }

00067 void modules::options::AddArgument(const int& number, const std::string& option){
00068     // Get the name of this argument
00069     std::string name = modules::factory::Instance()->GetArgumentName(fModuleName,number);
00070     // Set the value of the corresponding option
00071     modules::options::SetOption(name,option);

00074 bool modules::options::AppendToOption(const std::string& name, const std::string& option){
00075     // Get the option 
00076     OptionsList_t::iterator it= fOptions.find(name);
00077 
00078     // If no option exists return false
00079     if(it==fOptions.end()) return false;
00080 
00081     // Add the value to it
00082     it->second+=" : "+option;
00083     return true;
00084 }
